thread.title: Muhyiddin admits government's success in steering country
thread.title_full: Muhyiddin admits government's success in steering country

title: Muhyiddin admits government's success in steering country
text:
6:06 PM Muhyiddin admits government's success in steering country 
KUANTAN: Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia president Tan Sri Muhyiddin Yassin has acknowledged the success of the Barisan Nasional and Umno-led government in steering Malaysia to become a developed and model Islamic country. 
He said the development carried out by Barisan and Umno, through one leadership after another, cannot be denied as Malaysia started from a country with nothing after independence. 
"At that time, we lacked knowledge, there were no industrial plants, no universities, life was difficult ... but now as a result of the struggles, the country has been lifted to a level we can be proud of," he said at a Pribumi talk in Kampung Batu Sawar, Sungai Lembing, here, Saturday. 
The Pagoh MP said it may sound dissonant for people to hear him say that, as though he is still in government. 
"But if the matter has merit, it should be merited. If that is true, the truth must be told. 
"Through decades of government policies initiated by Umno and BN, the country has become progressive, renowned and in the Islamic context, a model country," he said. Muhyiddin, who also touched on the current situation in the country, admitted that it will not be easy to defeat Barisan in the coming general election if there is no understanding among the opposition to have one-on-one fights. - Bernama <> <>
